description:
Is that a Flammulated Owl? These binoculars offer bright, sharp views in most environments. High optical performance with extended eye relief for comfortable viewing. Made with environmentally friendly, lead-free glass.

  • EXO Barrier Protection shields from water, dust, and debris
  • O-ring sealed for waterproofness
  • Roof-prism construction reduces weight and bulk
  • Fully multi-coated optics for superior light transmission and brightness
  • Large central focus wheel with twist-up rubber eyecups
  • BaK-4 prism glass for bright, clear, crisp viewing
  • Includes soft carrying case, neck strap, and lens cleaning cloth
  • Tripod compatible
name: Bushnell Prime 10x42 Binoculars
